Let S be a smooth cubic surface in projective 3-space, given by a homogeneous polynomial F(x, y, z, w) of degree 3. Let C be a rational curve in S with degree 7, given by a parameterization [x(t), y(t), z(t), w(t)], where x(t), y(t), z(t), and w(t) are homogeneous polynomials of degree 7.

The intersection of C and S is given by the points where F(x(t), y(t), z(t), w(t)) = 0. Since F is a homogeneous polynomial of degree 3 and x(t), y(t), z(t), w(t) are homogeneous polynomials of degree 7, F(x(t), y(t), z(t), w(t)) is a homogeneous polynomial of degree 21 in t.
